text.en: All the gurus, including glorious Virūpa,
text.en-trans: lama nam dang palden birwapa

text.en: The great benevolent one,1Sonam Tsemo,
text.en-trans: tsewa chenpo sönam tsemo dang

text.en: Drakpa Gyaltsen, Sakya Paṇḍita,
text.en-trans: drakpa gyaltsen sakya pandita

text.en: Lodrö Gyaltsen, Ngorchen Kunga Zangpo,
text.en-trans: lodrö gyaltsen ngorchen künga zang

text.en: Losal Gyatso, Khyentse Wangchuk,
text.en-trans: losal gyatso khyentsé wangchuk dang

text.en: Jamyang Khyentse, Loter Wangpo and the rest,
text.en-trans: jamyang khyentsé loter wangpo sok

text.en: All you gurus of the lineage of Lamdré teachings,
text.en-trans: sung ngak gyüpé lama tamché dang

text.en: Together with Hevajra and the eight goddesses,
text.en-trans: gyepa dorjé lhamo gyé dangché

text.en: Mighty lord Mahākāla, consort and retinue, and others,
text.en-trans: tutob wangchuk gönpo chamdral sok

text.en: Turn your wise attention towards me, and
text.en-trans: dak la gong shing mönpé né didak

text.en: Be a witness to the swift fulfilment of these points of aspiration. Kyé!
text.en-trans: nyurdu drub la pangpor dzö chik kyé

text.en: As I have fallen under the power of carelessness,
text.en-trans: dak ni bakmepa yi wang du gyur

text.en: My dharmic practice has been beset by adversity,
text.en-trans: chö zhin chö la galkyen ché mang zhing

text.en: And my turbulent, mistaken thoughts in particular
text.en-trans: khyepar tsul min namtok tsubma yi

text.en: Have prevented my character from becoming workable,
text.en-trans: dak gyü lé su rungwar magyurpé

text.en: Henceforth, therefore, may I strive to tame my mind.
text.en-trans: deng né rangsem dul la tsönpar shok

text.en: May I avoid companions and places that inflame emotion,
text.en-trans: nyönmong pelwé né dang drok pang shing

text.en: Ignore the beckoning demons of the sensory pleasures,
text.en-trans: döyön dü kyi yabmö ma khyer war

text.en: And remain content with dharma-practicing friends
text.en-trans: chö tün chöpé drok dang zegö sok

text.en: And modest food, clothing and other necessities.
text.en-trans: tsowa ngen ngön tsam gyi chok shé shok

text.en: Meaningless chatter triggers attachment and aversion.
text.en-trans: dönmé ngak khyal chakdang pelwé gyu

text.en: Having put a stop to speech that is by nature harmful,
text.en-trans: nyepé rangzhin mawa ché né su

text.en: Aside from brief messages with purely dharmic content,
text.en-trans: chö tün tam gyi jorwa nyung ngu lé

text.en: May I strive to maintain only continuous recitation.
text.en-trans: taktu khatön jé la tsönpar shok

text.en: May I never be without renunciation, bodhicitta,
text.en-trans: ngejung changsem yangdak tawa dang

text.en: And the genuine view, uphold perfect ethics,
text.en-trans: namyang mindral tsultrim pünsum tsok

text.en: Delight the guru out of faith and devotion,
text.en-trans: dé dang mögü lama nyepar jé

text.en: And transform all that I do into bodhisattva conduct.
text.en-trans: chi jé changchub chö la gyurwar shok

text.en: May I guard the common and uncommon vows as I would my own life-force,
text.en-trans: tünmong tünmin dompa sok tar sung

text.en: And through the power of exerting myself in the path of the two stages in four sessions,
text.en-trans: lama kyilkhor tsowor shepa yi

text.en: With the knowledge that my guru is the chief deity of the maṇḍala,
text.en-trans: rim nyi tün zhi lam la tsönpé tü

text.en: May I swiftly attain the level of the wondrous four kāyas!
text.en-trans: mejung ku zhi gopang nyur tob shok

text.en: Through repeated practice of the way of the four empowerments,
text.en-trans: lam gyi nyingpo zabmo wang zhi lam

text.en: The profound heart of the path, may I create the auspicious conditions for the four kāyas,
text.en-trans: yang yang gompé ku zhi tendrel drik

text.en: And having actualized the maṇḍala of the vajra body,
text.en-trans: dorjé lü kyi kyilkhor ngöngyur né

text.en: May I dance as Hevajra throughout the three worlds!
text.en-trans: gyepa dorjé si sum garjé shok
